Package util

Class Convert

java.lang.Object
util.Convert
public class Convert extends Object
Utility class for converting between different data types and formats.

Available methods:

  • DateToLocalDate(Date)
  • StringToLocalDate_yyyyMMdd(String)
  • StringToLocalTime(String)
  • doubleToString(Double)
  • StringToDouble(String)
  • roundToTwoDecimalPlaces(double)
